      • setState

        public void setState(Game.State state)
        Changes the state of the game. Also sends update to controller.

        Shows and hides the opponents pawns depending on the game state. Also shows messages when the players need to switch.

        Overrides:
        setState in class Logic
        Parameters:
        state - The state to change to

      • fight

        public Pawn fight(Pawn attacker,
                  Pawn defender)
        Calculate the result of a fight between two pawns.

        Hides the players pawns. Shows both the pawns in the fight and opens a dialog to start the fight so both players can watch it.

        Overrides:
        fight in class Logic
        Parameters:
        attacker - The attacking pawn
        defender - The defending pawn
        Returns:
        Pawn The winner
